Sleep well

Drink scotch

Like camping

Believe in ghosts

Know how to whistle with two fingers

Enjoy flying

Understand the end of Inception

Cope well in the dark

Take enough long walks

Eat ham

Run in public

Fall gracefully

Stretch before exercising

Jump queues

Dream often

Skip

Take sugar

Knit

Stretch after exercising

Watch Homeland

Bake
